channel.title: Comments for page "C4.1 - an Exothermic Process"

item.title: Re: Handling conflicts?
item.content:encoded: We only see this discussion among people who aren't using the process. In practice the problem-solution approach works so well it's now been codified into C4 as an obligatory part of the process.

item.title: Handling conflicts?
item.content:encoded:
I like the idea of this process but I wonder how universally applicable it is.

Specifically, it seems that there can still be a lot of debate about what constitutes a problem and if the PR indeed solves this problem.

Did situations like these arise in ZeroMQ?
